Factsheet

Developer:
Cheeky Stork
Release date:
2025
Platforms:
Steam
Website:
cheekystork.com

Description

"Manners Be Damned!" is a couch co-op party platformer in which you and up to 8 of your friends will put your skills (and your friendships) to the test! Race through a trap-laden dungeon in a Temple Dash, or fight to the bitter end to keep control of what's most precious in a King of the Hat arena. The only tools you’ll have are your fancy canes - use them wisely - push each other into trouble, activate hidden mechanisms, send pesky projectiles towards your fellow competitors, or unceremoniously de-hat them for extra flare!

History

The idea for "Manners Be Damned!" was born in early 2024 as part of the "Global Game Jam" here in Lithuania. The prototype hooked us, so we decided to turn it into a full game. After three short months we had a brand new demo and an invitation to participate in "Comic Con Baltics" to showcase our game to the public properly for the first time. The feedback was overwhelmingly positive and we've been improving on it ever since.
In late 2024 we applied to the GameTech Accelerator program here in Lithuania and were lucky enough to be accepted. This provided us with much needed funding and allowed us to take this game to a whole new level.
After working on it for nearly two years we are proud to say we released the game on Steam in November of 2025.

Features

  • Local co-op for up to 8 players (compatible with Steam Remote Play Together for remote play)
  • 2 distinct game modes ("King of the Hat" and "Temple Dash")
  • Hilarious player interactions
  • 100% voice-recorded SFX
  • Accessible for all ages and skill levels
